name: Kitten and food: adventure park
description: Help to collect all the food for a gluttonous cat. Beware of collision with all kinds of obstacles in the form of birds, stakes and high-rise buildings. Â  The game features 60 levels with two bonus, excellent graphics and fun background music. Play and have fun with the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
